name: Canyon Miner: Minecart Rush
summary: Get ready for the seat of your pants wild ride of your life - on a minecart! Navigate through the Old Mine as you search for Gems! This isn't the friendliest mine though. Bottomless pits, sharp hanging rocks, and giant Bats and Spiders make this one challenging run. Can you handle the pressure? Can you fill your pockets? Gamecenter lets you compete for high scores.
